official_title: A bill to authorize the President of the United States to present on behalf of the Congress a specially struck gold medal to Jesse Owens.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to present, on behalf of the Congress, a specially struck gold medal to Jesse Owens in recognition of his athletic achievements in the 1936 Olympics. Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to strike bronze duplicates of such medal for sale to the general public.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the President of the United States to present on behalf of the Congress a specially struck gold medal to Jesse Owens.
